page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: The population of the village is just under 900,at an average of 3 to each dwelling. In a survey of 17 households we counted a total of 39 adults (over 18 years); 1 (16-18yrs); 10 (11-16yrs); 11 (5-10yrs); and 2 (0-4yrs). In our sample,none of the householders had been born in the main village (Little Weighton) and none had any grown-up children living elsewhere in the village. None had parents living in the village either. Most children under 11yrs go to the village primary school, and at 11yrs old,most transfer to Cottingham High School (5km).
